roleset.name: to direct the course

example.name: maneuver-v: all arguments
example.text: Playing black in the first game , the human champion maneuvered Deep Thought , known for its attacking prowess , into a totally passive position .

propbank.arg: Deep Thought , known for its attacking prowess

example.name: maneuver-v: maneuver his way
example.text: In August 1983 , Mr. Noriega took over as General and de - facto dictator of Panama , having maneuvered his way to the top only two years after the mysterious death in a plane crash of his old boss Omar Torrijos .

propbank.arg: only two years after the mysterious death in a plane crash of his old boss Omar Torrijos

example.name: make_maneuver-l: Within LVC
example.text: Instead of castling , a standard measure to safeguard the king , D.T. made a second - rate rook maneuver at move 13 ; then it put a knight offside on move 16 .

propbank.arg: Instead of castling , a standard measure to safeguard the king

roleset.note: MANEUVER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'maneuver' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from maneuver.01-v predicate notes)
MANEUVER-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry maneuver.01. Framed by Claire. (from maneuver.01-n)
